member.name: validFrom
member.comment:
[db, null, -r-w] The begin date of the valid period of this bean, or null if valid since it is created
It is used only by QL, not visible to developer

member.name: validThru
member.comment:
[db, null, -r-w] The end date of the valid period of this bean, or null if never expired.
It is used only by QL, not visible to developer
